recipe.title: Herb Rub
recipe.step: Mix all ingredients together and rub on meat prior to cooking. In this photo I cooked 2 pork loins for 40minutes on several chopped garlic cloves and herb rub on top. Serve with roasted veggies and spinach salad.
If using fresh herbs replace one teaspoon with one tablespoon of fresh herbs. Double amount and store in airtight got container (for dried herbs only.) Use the extra next time!
